segment.text: After digging to a depth of 100m last year, Russian scientists found traces of copper wiring
that their ancestors already had a telephone network one thousand years ago.
So as not to be outdone, in the weeks
that followed, American scientists dug 200m, and headlines in the US newspapers
"US scientists have found traces of 2000 year old optical fibres,
that their ancestors already had advanced high-tech digital telephone 1000 years earlier than the Russians."
One week later, the Irish press reported the following: "After digging as deep as 500m, Irish scientists have found absolutely nothing.
that 5000 years ago, their ancestors were already using mobile phones".
Nelson Mandela is sitting at home
when he hears a knock at the door.
he is confronted by a little Chinese man,
Behind him is an enormous truck full of car exhausts.
Nelson is standing there in complete amazement,
when the Chinese man starts to yell louder.
you've obviously got the wrong man",
and shuts the door in his face.
The next day he hears a knock at the door again.
When he opens it, the little Chinese man is back with a huge truck of brake pads.
He thrusts his clipboard under Nelson's nose, yelling,
Mr Mandela is getting a bit
so he pushes the little Chinese man back,
Then he slams the door in his face again.
The following day, Nelson is resting,
and late in the afternoon, he hears a knock on the door again.
On opening the door, there is the same little Chinese man
thrusting a clipboard under his nose,
Behind him are TWO very large trucks full of car parts.
This time Nelson loses his temper completely,
he picks up the little man by his shirt front
You must have the wrong name!
Who do you want to give these to?"
The little Chinese man looks at him very puzzled,
and says, "You not Nissan Main Dealer?"
A language instructor was explaining to her class
that in French, nouns unlike their English counterparts, are grammatically designated as masculine or feminine.
and the word wasn't in her French dictionary.
So for fun she split the class into two groups appropriately enough,
by gender and asked them to decide
whether Computer should be a masculine or feminine noun.
Both groups were required to give four reasons for their recommendation.
that computers should definitely be of the feminine gender ("la computer"), because:
1. No one but their creator understands their internal logic;
2. The native language they use to communicate with other computers is incomprehensible to everyone else;
3. Even the smallest mistakes are stored in long-term memory for possible later retrieval; and
4. As soon as you make a commitment to one,
you find yourself spending half your salary on accessories for it.
that computers should be masculine("le computer"), because:
1. In order to get their attention,
you have to turn them on;
2. They have a lot of data
3. They are supposed to help you solve problems, but half the time
4. As soon as you commit to one,
that if you'd waited a little longer,
you could have gotten a better model.
A small boy is sent to bed by his father.
Can you bring me a drink of water?"
Can I have a drink of water??"
"When you come in to spank me, can you bring me a drink of water?"
An exasperated mother, whose son was always getting into mischief,
"How do you expect to get into Heaven?"
"Well, I'll just run in and out and in
and out and keep slamming the door
until St. Peter says 'For Heaven's sake, Jimmy,
One summer evening during a violent thunderstorm a mother was tucking her small boy into bed.
She was about to turn off the light
when he asked with a tremor in his voice,
"Mommy, will you sleep with me tonight?"
and gave him a reassuring hug.
"I have to sleep in Daddy's room."
A mother took her three-year-old daughter to church for the first time.
and then the choir came down the aisle,
until the little one started to sing in a loud voice, "Happy birthday to you.
It was that time during the Sunday morning service for "the children's sermon,"
and all the children were invited to come forward.
One little girl was wearing a particularly pretty dress
The little girl replied, directly into the pastor's clip-on microphone,
making faces at others on the playground,
Ms. Smith stopped to gently reprove the child.
"Bobby, when I as a child I was told
that if I made ugly faces,
and I would stay like that."
